2.2子曰：¶
「《詩》三百，¶

曰：¶
『思無邪。』」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_002-3a>¶

# src: LY 02.03; tr. CH
2.3子曰：¶

不踰矩。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_002-5a>¶

# src: LY 02.05:01; tr. CH
2.5孟懿子問孝。¶
子曰：¶
「無違。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_002-6a>¶

子曰：¶

「色難。¶

2.9子曰：¶

小人比而不周。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_002-16a>¶	KR1a0013_001:27a:6:20:1,KR1a0041_008:9b:5:17:0,KR1a0046_008:28b:7:3:408,KR1a0046_008:30b:3:5:434,KR1a0046_008:31b:3:9:448,KR1a0047_006:4b:4:9:0,KR1a0056_003:43a:4:20:1,KR1a0073_002:8b:1:4:0,KR1a0075_003:2b:1:11:0,KR1a0091_010:22b:3:12:0,KR1a0119_001:24b:6:19:1,KR1a0139_014:16b:8:18:192,KR1b0007_016:9a:6:14:1,KR1c0012_004:12b:8:20:0,KR1d0057_142:25a:5:4:0,KR1e0003_015:23a:8:16:2,KR1e0004_020:24b:5:1:1,KR1e0048_001:16b:5:29:2,KR1e0064_002:11b:5:9:69,KR1e0071_004:43a:5:19:13,KR1e0074_003:9b:4:33:2,KR1e0094_005:8a:2:22:12,KR1g0009_001:12b:1:9:3,KR1h0004_002:1a:80:1:14,KR1h0005_001:10b:1:17:0,KR1h0006_001:26a:5:2:28,KR1h0006_001:26a:6:23:28,KR1h0007_002:7b:8:20:17,KR1h0007_015:12b:4:23:27,KR1h0012_001:18b:10:9:59,KR1h0015_001:11b:1:25:6,KR1h0017_002:27a:8:9:79,KR1h0019_001:18b:9:9:56,KR1h0020_001:11b:1:9:52,KR1h0021_000:20b:7:9:100,KR1h0024_006:23b:7:3:6,KR1h0026_001:18b:11:9:62,KR1h0028_004:60b:3:9:104,KR1h0034_004:48b:7:9:105,KR1h0034_004:49a:3:25:106,KR1h0034_010:25a:10:19:96,KR1h0037_002:18b:7:2:57,KR1h0038_005:24a:9:9:104,KR1h0039_003:54b:8:7:282,KR1h0043_002:27a:8:9:51,KR1h0043_002:27b:6:39:52,KR1h0043_013:31a:7:17:97,KR2d0006_198:55b:7:20:14,KR2f0039_130:43b:3:9:2,KR2m0022_003:25b:3:12:98,KR2o0022_012:36a:8:5:202,KR3a0058_015:15b:2:9:176,KR3a0059_032:55b:8:9:3,KR3j0051_002:6a:1:10:0,KR3j0082_008:11a:1:1:3,KR3j0129_000:17b:7:15:18,KR3k0008_092:11b:7:19:10,KR3k0013_531:3a:2:8:2,KR3k0025_049:45a:3:11:18,KR3k0055_320:9b:6:3:11,KR4d0226_008:24a:7:7:4008,KR4d0226_041:24a:7:7:21,KR4d0285_001:10b:8:14:4,KR4d0285_001:11a:8:18:4,KR4h0130_006:2a:8:15:6,KR6d0063_006:0237a:2:12:159

# src: LY 02.17; tr. CH
2.17子曰：¶
「由！¶

是知也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_002-19a>¶

# src: LY 02.18; tr. CH
2.18子張學干祿。¶
子曰：¶

言寡尤，¶
行寡悔，¶
祿在其中矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_002-20a>¶	KR1h0004_002:1a:103:1:18,KR1h0004_015:7a:123:1:32,KR1h0006_007:5b:1:40:8,KR1h0007_002:9a:8:10:21,KR1h0007_002:9b:4:9:21,KR1h0007_015:13a:9:19:31,KR1h0012_001:20b:7:15:66,KR1h0019_003:42a:4:19:205,KR1h0020_001:12a:6:15:58,KR2a0001_500:151a:11:1:150,KR2d0005_032:20b:1:10:1,KR2f0039_168:27a:6:9:26,KR2k0047_043:22b:2:30:286,KR2m0001_022:6b:2:5:2,KR2m0002_076:2b:4:14:3,KR3a0010_001:2b:1:7:0,KR3a0031_006:5a:4:20:2,KR3a0031_006:5a:6:20:2,KR3a0059_029:34a:7:15:2,KR3a0108_022:44a:5:11:40,KR3j0014_000:28b:5:10:10,KR3j0185_071:14a:8:4:2,KR3k0058_132:14b:4:39:2,KR4c0041_037:11b:3:6:16,KR4d0214_006:18a:8:4:25,KR4d0468_001:20b:2:9:18,KR4e0150_041:13b:6:21:12,KR4j0068_004:28a:6:20:35,KR5i0071_007:07p034b:9:20:40,KR6e0012_027:0207a:25:6:29,KR6e0012_027:0207a:28:7:29,KR6e0021_011:0484b:15:11:117,KR6p0098_001:0246b:1:1:47,KR6q0143_001:0685a:20:3:86,KR6q0184_004:0423a:5:16:89,KR6q0214_012:0035a:24:13:119,KR6q0510_004:0211a:10:1:18,KR6r0147_001:0644a:14:9:6,KR6s0069_013:0595a:5:13:134

其何以行之哉？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_002-24a>¶	KR1a0028_031:16b:5:5:1,KR1a0033_001:62b:2:19:2,KR1a0041_009:11a:8:4:0,KR1a0051_003:15b:1:15:0,KR1a0090_001:140a:8:4:0,KR1a0091_010:40b:8:12:0,KR1a0102_001:22b:2:9:0,KR1a0102_003:13a:5:8:0,KR1a0102_006:10b:3:19:0,KR1a0102_007:1b:8:6:0,KR1a0102_013:13a:1:3:0,KR1a0102_016:3a:5:18:0,KR1a0121_005:20b:4:17:1,KR1a0121_012:32a:7:9:6,KR1a0135_007:2b:8:19:1,KR1a0139_015:19b:6:9:206,KR1d0007_002:78a:7:12:20,KR1d0007_003:60a:8:7:18,KR1d0010_021:38a:7:15:0,KR1d0013_004:61a:2:10:18,KR1e0051_004:17b:6:20:1,KR1g0009_001:15a:7:3:3,KR1h0004_002:1a:135:1:22,KR1h0005_001:12b:6:2:0,KR1h0006_001:31a:2:15:36,KR1h0007_002:11b:5:12:25,KR1h0007_002:11b:9:7:25,KR1h0008_002:12b:9:11:74,KR1h0010_000:5b:5:5:13,KR1h0012_001:23b:6:20:73,KR1h0012_001:24a:2:13:74,KR1h0015_001:13a:7:19:6,KR1h0017_002:41a:5:20:127,KR1h0019_001:23b:1:20:71,KR1h0020_001:13a:6:20:64,KR1h0021_000:24b:7:20:116,KR1h0024_006:27a:1:6:6,KR1h0026_001:23b:8:20:79,KR1h0028_004:68a:4:20:124,KR1h0028_004:68a:10:33:125,KR1h0034_004:56b:8:20:125,KR1h0034_005:31b:8:37:73,KR1h0038_005:28a:4:20:124,KR1h0039_001:39a:5:20:175,KR1h0043_002:38b:6:20:71,KR2d0015_004:9b:7:10:1,KR2e0020_085:21a:3:19:10,KR2f0039_274:35b:1:3:2,KR2k0021_024:6a:3:16:1,KR2k0045_122:9a:4:13:6,KR2l0020_001:33a:7:13:14,KR3a0008_007:7b:9:11:3,KR3a0016_003:5a:1:13:15,KR3a0019_002:4a:7:5:4,KR3a0059_008:55b:7:20:10,KR3j0082_008:11a:8:5:3,KR3j0185_070:33a:7:13:14,KR3k0008_026:28a:2:30:14,KR3k0011_016:12b:8:10:4,KR3k0025_049:77a:3:2:34,KR3k0027_011:16a:8:3:10,KR3k0029_174:12b:3:9:6,KR3k0045_079:24a:1:18:6,KR3k0046_089:19b:7:4:8,KR3k0050_087:11b:6:15:5,KR4d0047_006:27b:2:4:23,KR4d0082_050:2a:2:43:724,KR4d0102_002:14b:2:21:8,KR4d0207_012:10b:9:18:14,KR4d0215_012:5a:8:21:5,KR4d0285_008:12a:5:1:6,KR4e0137_004:5b:4:6:4,KR4e0213_002:10b:5:19:7,KR4h0022_813:5a:4:17:7,KR4h0056_001:8b:5:4:16,KR4h0056_002:23b:1:6:41,KR5c0070_002:014a:3:5:10,KR5c0079_014:013a:6:3:5,KR5c0089_003:009b:6:4:1,KR5d0050_002:004a:5:13:7,KR5h0033_038:003b:9:10:5,KR5i0057_0 所損益，¶
可知也；¶

2.24子曰：¶
